name: 30 Seconds or Less
description:
30 Seconds or Less is a game that stuffs a full RPG experience into a bite-sized package. From talking with NPCs to various forms of combat, the game is predicated on quick and witty humor that plays off of the common tropes that define RPGs. This game exists to give players the full RPG experience in a way that covers the important points and skips the filler!

The visual style is inspired by past RPGs and is evocative on playing on a retro system, such as the SNES or Genesis.

Features:

  • Exhilarating rush of excitement 
  • Experience a full RPG in a fraction of the time
  • Four overworld levels to explore
  • Beautiful music
  • Hilarious dialogue

Disclaimer: This game was made by students for educational purposes. Art and music  from other intellectual properties was used.
